hanzi-su-wiki:
縦

Значения

Вертикальное направление; рост, высота

Мнемоника

Искажено. Направление, которому следует 従 опущенная нитка 糸, вертикаль.

Варианты

縱, 纵
purpleculture_pinyin:
zòng
old variant of 纵
старый вариант вертикального
rtega_mnemonic:
縱縱RS
纵纵		𦂵縦vertical, length, height, self-indulgent, wayward
  • follow 從 one's own line 糸: be self-indulgent and put one's back as vertical as possible to show one's length or height
heisig_constituent: vertical, thread, spiderman, accompany, Nelson, column, going, line, horns, mend
koohiiStory1: When Spider-man does his amazing vertical wall climbing, a throng of photographers accompanies him to get a good shot of the action.
koohiiStory2: True vertical can be found by hanging a plumb line - a thread accompanied by a weight.
jp_example_words:
操縦(そうじゅう): management, handling, control, manipulation
縦(たて): length, height
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You see a thread that wants to loiter from some horns and you would be correct to assume that it would hang vertical. The thread wants to loiter and hang from one of the horns. When things hang from things, they usually hang vertical, so that’s what this thread is going to do.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at this vertical thread as it hangs from the horns. Take hold of it and pull on the vertical thread. Feel it in your hand.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: For some reason, Channing Tatum (たて) is strangely attracted to vertical pieces of hanging thread. Channing Tatum starts batting at the vertical thread like a cat.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Look at Channing Tatum playing with this thread. He’s like a cat playing with a piece of yarn. Look at Mr. Tatum bouncing around batting at the thread like some silly feline.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 従 (したがう、ジュウ следовать, подчиняться).
Ru_Radicals: 并, 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 彳 (шаг), 疋 (животные), 糸 (нить)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the thread (糸) obeys (従) the vertical

Name meaning

zòng
яп. вм. 纵
Radicals: 糸, 彳, 正  (thread, loiter, correct, horns)
Meaning Mnemonic
You see a thread that wants to loiter from some horns and you would be correct to assume that it would hang vertical. The thread wants to loiter and hang from one of the horns. When things hang from things, they usually hang vertical, so that’s what this thread is going to do.
Look at this vertical thread as it hangs from the horns. Take hold of it and pull on the vertical thread. Feel it in your hand.
Reading Mnemonic
For some reason, Channing Tatum (たて) is strangely attracted to vertical pieces of hanging thread. Channing Tatum starts batting at the vertical thread like a cat.
Look at Channing Tatum playing with this thread. He’s like a cat playing with a piece of yarn. Look at Mr. Tatum bouncing around batting at the thread like some silly feline.
